g++  -march=native -Ofast -Wfatal-errors -std=c++2a -g CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day01.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day02.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day03.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day04.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day05.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day06.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day07.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day08.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day09.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day10.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day11.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day12.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day13.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day14.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day15.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day16.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day17.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day18.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day19.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day20.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day21.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day22.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day23.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day24.cpp.o CMakeFiles/advent2017.dir/src/day25.cpp.o -o advent2017
